metadata.name: Suspicious MSDT Parent Process
metadata.comment: Detects msdt.exe executed by a suspicious parent as seen in CVE-2022-30190 / Follina exploitation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wsl.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msdt.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('msdt.exe'))

output.summary: Detects msdt.exe executed by a suspicious parent as seen in CVE-2022-30190 / Follina exploitation
